name: WordPress Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin未经授权的数据修改漏洞
product: ["WordPress Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin <=2.0.22"]
description: WordPress Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin是一款专为WooCommerce电商平台设计的虚拟货币收款插件。WordPress Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin存在未经授权的数据修改漏洞，该漏洞源于缺少权限检查，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致未经授权的数据修改。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/triplea-cryptocurrency-payment-gateway-for-woocommerce
patch: WordPress Cryptocurrency Payment Gateway for WooCommerce plugin未经授权的数据修改漏洞的补丁
